Rails Single Table Inheritance

认识Rails STI很久了，但一直都是只在Model层动点皮毛。但STI的魅力远不止于此。在此记录下STI为Controller，route带来的便利。话不多说，假使我们有如下四个Model：

 1     # app/models/animal.rb
 2     class Animal < ActiveRecord::Base 
 3         self.inheritance_column = :race #指明STI字段，默认情况下为type,如果为model添加一个名为type的字段rails会智能的启用STI，如果不想启用需要用self.inheritance_column = :fake_column来指明。
 4     end
 5     
 6     class Lion < Animal
 7         def talk
 8             puts 'It means no worries for the rest of your days'
 9         end
10     end
11     
12     class Meerkat < Animal
13         def talk
14             puts 'Hakuna Matata, what a wonderful phrase !'
15         end        
16     end 
17     
18     class WildBoar < Animal
19         def talk
20             puts 'Hakuna Matata! Ain't no passing craze'
21         end
22     end

以上为典型的STI model层的使用案例，那么如果要对animal生成CRUD，并且要求访问的路径不同，是否需要每个类别都要建立对应的controller，route呢？显然，这不够简洁。使用STI相关技巧即可实现用一个controller管理不同类别的animal，代码如下：

1     # config/routes.rb
2     resources :animals
3     resources :lions, controller: 'animals', type: 'Lion' 
4     resources :meerkats, controller: 'animals', type: 'Meerkat' 
5     resources :wild_boars, controller: 'animals', type: 'WildBoar'

注意到type了吧，没错，这里就是STI在route中的魔法糖。当访问/lions的时候，实际上会被导向到animals controller中，并且rails会加一个名为type的参数到路径中：params[:type] = ‘Lion’。那么在animal中我们就可以这么写：

 1     class AnimalsController < ApplicationController 
 2         before_action :set_race
 3     
 4         def index 
 5             @animals = race_class.all 
 6         end
 7     
 8         # Code hidden for brivety
 9     
10         private
11     
12         def set_race 
13            @race = race 
14         end
15     
16         def race 
17             Animal.races.include?(params[:type]) ? params[:type] : "Animal"
18         end
19     
20         def race_class 
21             race.constantize 
22         end
23     
24     end

这样，在访问不同类别animal的路径的时候，会显示对应类别的animal。以下是除index外其它方法的实现：

 1     # helpers/animals_helper.rb
 2     # 根据参数的不同动态的返回路径
 3     def sti_animal_path(race = "animal", animal = nil, action = nil)
 4       send "#{format_sti(action, race, animal)}_path", animal
 5     end
 6     
 7     def format_sti(action, race, animal)
 8       action || animal ? "#{format_action(action)}#{race.underscore}" : "#{race.underscore.pluralize}"
 9     end
10     
11     def format_action(action)
12       action ? "#{action}_" : ""
13     end

Index页面中的超链接：

1     <%= link_to 'Show', sti_animal_path(animal.race, animal) %>

animals controller继续改进：

 1     class AnimalsController < ApplicationController
 2       before_action :set_animal, only: [:show, :edit, :update, :destroy]
 3       before_action :set_race
 4     
 5       def index
 6         @animals = race_class.all
 7       end
 8     
 9       def show
10       end
11     
12       def new
13         @animal = race_class.new
14       end
15     
16       private
17       def set_animal
18         @animal = race_class.find(params[:id])
19       end
20     
21     end

这样在show页面中就可以自由的访问@animal的属性了

1     <h1>Hi, I'm a <%= @animal.race %>.</h1>
2     <p>My name is <%= @animal.name %></p>
3     <%= @animal.talk %>
4     <!-- 返回到对应类别animal列表的超链接 -->
5     <td><%= link_to "See all #{animal.race.pluralize}", sti_animal_path(animal.race) %></td> 
6     <!-- 返回到所有类别animal列表的超链接 -->
7     <%= link_to 'See all animals', sti_animal_path %>
8     <%= link_to "New #{@race}", sti_animal_path(@race, nil, :new) %>

new页面：

 1     <%= form_for(@animal) do |f| %>
 2       <% if @animal.errors.any? %>
 3         <div id="error_explanation">
 4           <h2><%= pluralize(@animal.errors.count, "error") %> prohibited this animal from being saved:</h2>
 5     
 6           <ul>
 7           <% @animal.errors.full_messages.each do |msg| %>
 8             <li><%= msg %></li>
 9           <% end %>
10           </ul>
11         </div>
12       <% end %>
13     
14       <div class="field">
15         <%= f.label :name %><br>
16         <%= f.text_field :name %>
17       </div>
18     
19       <div class="field">
20           <%= f.label :race %><br>
21           <%= f.select :race, Animal.races.map {|r| [r.humanize, r.camelcase]}, {}, disabled: @race != "Animal" %> 
22       </div>
23     
24       <div class="field">
25         <%= f.label :age %><br>
26         <%= f.text_field :age %>
27       </div>
28     
29       <div class="actions">
30         <%= f.submit %>
31       </div>
32     <% end %>

Create的实现：

 1     class AnimalsController < ApplicationController
 2         def create 
 3             @animal = Animal.new(animal_params)
 4             if @animal.save
 5               redirect_to @animal, notice: "#{race} was successfully created."
 6             else
 7               render action: 'new'
 8             end
 9         end
10     
11         private
12         def animal_params 
13             params.require(race.underscore.to_sym).permit(:name, :race, :age) 
14         end
15     
16     end

animal_params为Rails4的新特性，规定我们只接受特定的三个参数。

继续添加编辑和删除： Index erb：

1       <td><%= link_to 'Edit', sti_animal_path(animal.race, animal, :edit) %></td>
2       <td><%= link_to 'Destroy', sti_animal_path(animal.race, animal), method: :delete, data: { confirm: 'Are you sure?' } %></td>

Controller 中：

 1     def update
 2       if @animal.update(animal_params)
 3         redirect_to @animal, notice: "#{race} was successfully created."
 4       else
 5         render action: 'edit'
 6       end
 7     end
 8     
 9     def destroy
10       @animal.destroy
11       redirect_to animals_url
12     end

最后是编辑页面：

1     #views/animals/edit.html.erb
2     <h1>Editing <%= "#{@race}" %></h1>
3     <%= render 'form' %>
4     <%= link_to 'Back', sti_animal_path(@race) %>

Why and how I migrated from Wordpress to Jekyll

Since I started writing this blog I’ve always used Wordpress and it’s great, but the need to update Wordpress and its plug ins (a lot of them) always annoyed me.

Even I don’t have much more time to write here I always wanted to write again. After I decided to write back, I also decided to improve my blog, with a new theme and a better and fun way to write posts.

My choice and why

I chose to migrate this blog from Wordpress to Jekyll. But why Jekyll?

Unlike Wordpress, Jekyll isn’t a full CMS, it’s a lot simpler, I can have a static site that is a lot lighter than Wordpress and mainly I just wanted to learn a new tool.

More reasons why I choose Jekyll were:

  • It’s in Ruby :)
  • It uses liquid for the templating
  • I can use git for the versioning of both code and posts
  • Posts can be written in Markdown

Select a theme

I found the hpstr-jekyll-theme for Jekyll. so I decided to use it as a base for my own new theme. Here is the post tell how to use it : http://mmistakes.github.io/hpstr-jekyll-theme/

Hosting on Github Pages

Well, hosting static content in Github Pages is a piece of cake and it’s completely free. I just had to create a new repository there and send (git push) my files to it. It’s super easy! :)

I’ve used the pages below to understand how to use Jekyll with Github Pages and how to set up my own domain.

  • Using Jekyll with Pages
  • Setting up a custom domain with Pages
